name: perish-body
effect: When the Pokémon with Perish Body is hit with a contact move, both the attacker and the Pokémon with Perish Body will faint in three turns.
short_effect: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

flavor_text.sword-shield: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.
